titles: The pastoral letter reburnt by a poetical flambeau
notes: Verse - "Thy pen so paints thy self, that justly we"
A satirical attack on Gilbert Burnet.
Copy tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
